name: Hanoi
description: There's plenty of amazing food in the capital; some of it specific to the north and even just Hanoi.

name: Saigon / Ho Chi Minh City
description: It's by far the biggest city in Vietnam and with that comes the best selection of food. It's food heaven!

name: Hoi An
description: This beautiful town has a few famous dishes but overall I found that most places were tourist traps and it was hard to find good authentic local food.

name: Phu Yen Province
description: When there are zero tourists, it's easily to find authentic local food.

name: Huế
description: The Imperial City is famous for its food, with many restaurants around the country dedicating themselves to Huế cuisine. However, I found it to be a bit of a let down. It's very possible that amazing food exists but it's just harder to find. Most options were for tourists and relatively unexciting.

name: Đà Lạt
description: Known for its food produce but not necessarily its cooking, the town is a tourist hotspot for foreigners and Vietnamese alike.

name: Phú Quốc
description: The big island in the south has lots of resorts but there are some local areas too.
